languages.text: Попав в западню чуждых ксеносских устройств, солдаты оказались не готовы противостоять им. Многие бойцы были разорваны в клочья, растерзаны десятками лезвий и сожжены заживо прежде, чем обезвредить систему защиты корабля. Выжившие члены группы обнаружили несколько занятных ксеносских технологий, но никакой информации о том, для чего их владельцы прибыли в систему Райкад.

traits.locale_text: Попав в западню чуждых ксеносских устройств, солдаты оказались не готовы противостоять им. Многие бойцы были разорваны в клочья, растерзаны десятками лезвий и сожжены заживо прежде, чем обезвредить систему защиты корабля. Выжившие члены группы обнаружили несколько занятных ксеносских технологий, но никакой информации о том, для чего их владельцы прибыли в систему Райкад.

languages.text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.
languages.original_text: Попав в западню чуждых ксеносских устройств, солдаты оказались не готовы противостоять им. Многие бойцы были разорваны в клочья, растерзаны десятками лезвий и сожжены заживо прежде, чем обезвредить систему защиты корабля. Выжившие члены группы обнаружили несколько занятных ксеносских технологий, но никакой информации о том, для чего их владельцы прибыли в систему Райкад.

traits.locale_text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralized. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xeno-tech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

languages.text: 士兵们并没有准备好面对异形不计其数的死亡陷阱。在虚空舰系统被彻底摧毁之前，那些恐怖的装置将无数受害者剁碎、撕裂、焚烧。幸存下来的士兵在这艘邪恶的虚空舰上发现了某些古怪的异形技术碎片，但没有发现任何线索，解释这艘飞船为什么会出现在莱卡德星系。
languages.original_text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: 士兵们并没有准备好面对异形不计其数的死亡陷阱。在虚空舰系统被彻底摧毁之前，那些恐怖的装置将无数受害者剁碎、撕裂、焚烧。幸存下来的士兵在这艘邪恶的虚空舰上发现了某些古怪的异形技术碎片，但没有发现任何线索，解释这艘飞船为什么会出现在莱卡德星系。

languages.text: 兵士たちは無数の異種族の罠に意表を突かれた。怪物のような仕掛けは、ヴォイドシップのシステムが無力化されるまで、犠牲者を切り刻み、引き裂き、焼却した。生き残った兵士たちは不気味なヴォイドシップから複数の奇妙な異星技術の破片を発見したが、なぜそれがライカド星系にあるのかを解明できるようなデータはなかった。
languages.original_text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: 兵士たちは無数の異種族の罠に意表を突かれた。怪物のような仕掛けは、ヴォイドシップのシステムが無力化されるまで、犠牲者を切り刻み、引き裂き、焼却した。生き残った兵士たちは不気味なヴォイドシップから複数の奇妙な異星技術の破片を発見したが、なぜそれがライカド星系にあるのかを解明できるようなデータはなかった。

languages.text: Los soldados no estaban preparados para enfrentarse a las innumerables trampas xenos. Los monstruosos artefactos habían triturado, desgarrado e incinerado a muchas víctimas antes de neutralizar los sistemas de la nave. Los soldados supervivientes encontraron varias piezas curiosas de xenotecnología en la siniestra nave del vacío, pero ningún dato que pudiera arrojar algo de luz sobre el motivo de su llegada al Sistema Rykad.
languages.original_text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: Los soldados no estaban preparados para enfrentarse a las innumerables trampas xenos. Los monstruosos artefactos habían triturado, desgarrado e incinerado a muchas víctimas antes de neutralizar los sistemas de la nave. Los soldados supervivientes encontraron varias piezas curiosas de xenotecnología en la siniestra nave del vacío, pero ningún dato que pudiera arrojar algo de luz sobre el motivo de su llegada al Sistema Rykad.

languages.text: Die Soldaten waren nicht auf die unzähligen Xenos-Fallen vorbereitet gewesen. Grauenhafte Vorrichtungen, hatten viele Opfer zerstückelt, zerrissen und eingeäschert, ehe die Systeme des Raumschiffs neutralisiert wurden. Die überlebenden Soldaten fanden auf dem düsteren Raumschiff mehrere merkwürdige Xenotech-Objekte, jedoch keinerlei Daten, die erklären würden, wie es in das Rykad-System gekommen war.
languages.original_text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: Die Soldaten waren nicht auf die unzähligen Xenos-Fallen vorbereitet gewesen. Grauenhafte Vorrichtungen, hatten viele Opfer zerstückelt, zerrissen und eingeäschert, ehe die Systeme des Raumschiffs neutralisiert wurden. Die überlebenden Soldaten fanden auf dem düsteren Raumschiff mehrere merkwürdige Xenotech-Objekte, jedoch keinerlei Daten, die erklären würden, wie es in das Rykad-System gekommen war.

languages.text: Les soldats ne sont pas préparés à braver la batterie de chausse-trappes xénos. Des engins monstrueux déchiquettent, hachent menu et incinèrent de nombreuses victimes avant d'être neutralisés. Les rescapés découvrent à bord du sinistre vaisseau d'étranges dispositifs xénotechnologiques, mais pas la moindre information susceptible d'expliquer sa venue dans le système Rykad.
languages.original_text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.

traits.locale_text: Les soldats ne sont pas préparés à braver la batterie de chausse-trappes xénos. Des engins monstrueux déchiquettent, hachent menu et incinèrent de nombreuses victimes avant d'être neutralisés. Les rescapés découvrent à bord du sinistre vaisseau d'étranges dispositifs xénotechnologiques, mais pas la moindre information susceptible d'expliquer sa venue dans le système Rykad.

languages.text: Asker, sayısız zeno tuzağıyla baş edecek gücü bulamıyor. Canavarca mekanizmalar, birçok kurbanı doğruyor, parçalıyor ve yakıyor. Uçsuz gemisinin sistemleri nihayet etkisiz hâle getirildiğindeyse askerler, uğursuz uçsuz gemisinde birkaç ilginç zeno teknolojisi buluyor ancak Rykad Sistemi'ne neden geldiğine dair herhangi bir veriye ulaşamıyor.
languages.original_text: The soldiers weren't prepared to face the countless xenos traps. Monstrous contraptions had minced, ripped apart, and incinerated many victims before the voidship's systems were neutralised. The surviving soldiers found several curious pieces of xenotech on the sinister voidship but no data that could shed some light on why it came to the Rykad System.
